subject: fix: resolve overflow and wrapping issues in dashboard
body:
- Stats cards: Change grid from 3-col to 1-col on mobile (sm:grid-cols-3)
- Stats labels: Add .stat-label class with responsive sizing
- Tabs bar: Add min-w-0 and flex-shrink-0 for proper overflow scrolling
- Filter select: Remove min-width constraint to prevent overflow
- Tabs bar: Add overflow:hidden to container
title: resolve overflow and wrapping issues in dashboard
